Translations.Text: Azoʙason kam namesavad va onho az noumedi xomus ʙosand
Mo ʙa onho zulme nakardaem, onho xud ʙa xudason sitam kardaand
Farjod ʙarovarand, ki ej moliki duzax kos Parvardigori tu moro ʙimironad. Megujad: «Na, sumo dar in co mondani hasted»
Mo sumoro ʙo haq osno kardem, vale ʙestaraton haqro ʙad dided
Ojo onho dar e'tiqodi xud poj fisurdaand? Mo ham poj fisurdaem
Ojo mepindorand, Mo rozu nacvo (suxanoni pinhoniasonro) namesunavem? Ore, rasuloni Mo nazdi onho hastand va menavisand
Bigu: «Agar Xudoi rahmonro farzande meʙud, man az naxustin parastandagon meʙudam
Pok ast Parvardigori osmonhovu zamin va Parvardigori ars az on nisʙatho, ki ʙa U medihend
Pas ʙiguzorason, to ʙa hamon suxanoni ʙotil masƣul ʙosand va ʙa ʙozica sargarm, to on ruze, ki onhoro va'da dodaand, ʙirasad
Ust, ki ham dar osmon Xudost va ham dar zamin Xudost va hakimu donost
Bartaru ʙuzurgvortar ast on kas, ki farmonravoii osmonhovu zamin va har ci dar mijoni onhost, az oni Ust va ilmi faro rasidani qijomat xosi Ust va ʙa U ʙozgardonida mesaved
Kasone ƣajri Uro, ki ʙa xudoi mexonand, qodir ʙa safo'ati kase nestand. Ƣajri kasone, ki az rui ilm ʙa haq sohidi doda ʙosand
Agar az onho ʙipursi, ki ci kase onhoro ofaridaast, megujand: «Olloh». Pas caro az haq ruj megardonand
Guftori pajjomʙar in ʙud: «Ej Parvardigori man, inho mardume hastand, ki imon nameovarand
Pas, az onho darguzar va ʙigu: «Salomat ʙosed!» Ore, ʙa zudi xohand donist
